text: My prayers are w/family & friends of fallen Lakeland police officer Arnulfo Crispin.  He will be remembered for his bravery & selflessness.
Just left a great group of community-minded citizens at the Rotary Club of Plant City. #plantcity #rotary
Proud to participate in a roundtable re: preventing scams on our military servicemen w/my friend Holly Petraeus and CFO @JeffAtwater.
Enjoyed speaking at #NADDI in Jax about fighting #pillmills.  Great to see our country's law enforcement engaged in this important issue
Enjoyed seeing my friends Janeen & Jesse Stokes at Cabinet this AM. Proud of their advocacy for juvenile arthritis. #ja http://t.co/F6EWWaBr
Great crowd at #RPOF Victory Dinner; Enjoyed spending time with my friend @SarahPalinUSA. We need to elect great leadership in '12. #tcot
I highly encourage participation tomorrow RT @TheJusticeDept: 10/29 is National Prescription Drug Take-Back Day, ... http://t.co/6qRcobQW
Thank you Junior Achievement Girls Jax for all you do. Was thrilled to be your Keynote today. @JAGirls
Attended mtgs on human trafficking at Columbia Law School w/fellow AGs today; Learning a lot about this growing problem. #humantrafficking
Looking forward to our Cabinet mtg at Kennedy Space Center. FL has always led the way in innovation & exploration.
Will be on @FoxNews @GeraldoOnFox tonight at 10pm to discuss the health care lawsuit #hcr #tcot #sayfie
RT @jkrelldavis: RT @myfloridalegal: AG Bondi talking with Jamie Colby on @FOXNews just after 11am this morning #sayfie
Looking forward to discussing the health care lawsuit with @loudobbsnews on @FoxBusiness at 730pm #hcr #sayfie
will be on #FoxNews America's Newsroom at 9:40am to discuss the health care lawsuit with @BillHemmer & @marthamaccallum #hcr #sayfie
will be talking about health care lawsuit On the Record with @gretawire tonight at 10pm EDT on @foxnews. #HCR #sayfie
My deepest condolences to the family of former Gov. Claude Kirk. He was a true hero for Florida and we will miss him.
Really enjoyed speaking at the #P5 morning program with our elected officials.  Great to see so many conservatives.
Looking forward to participating in the panel on Health Care. Great to see so many passionate about their freedom here at #CPACFL.  #HCR
In case you missed it, check out the interview with @seanhannity yesterday at http://t.co/R2cO1AB0.
Spending time with my dear friend @seanhannity.   Proud to be the first guest on his radio show today.  Be sure to tune in.  #sayfie

9/11 10-year anniversary reminds of our loss but also the strength of the American spirit. God bless all who lost loved ones that day.
My thoughts about untimely loss of Chairman Dave Bitner. Thoughts & prayers are with Wendy & family. http://t.co/NNS5Vp1
West Tampa juniors girls softball team are playing live on ESPN 2 in world series. Congrats to Coach Mike Valdez & our Florida team!
So proud of our boys from Tampa! Won Junior League World Series! http://t.co/vconUQy
Cheer on Palma Ceia boys baseball (11am) and girls softball (5pm) in Junior League Championships today! On ESPN2. FL is so proud!
Great participation at @FLSheriffs event. Thx to all sheriffs for all they do in keeping Florida safe. #sayfie
Just spoke to 64 Florida sheriffs in Daytona Beach about our war on pill mills and other public safety issues. #sayfie
Had a wonderful 4th of July celebration. Thank you to our veterans and servicemen and women for protecting our freedom!
Enjoyed lunch today with attorney and author Scott Turow! http://t.co/nDHPL8k
Wishing all fathers a great day including my incredible dad!!
Ed Dean and Alisa Artigas about to get married by Sheriff Parker! http://twitpic.com/5a9vqd

Thank you to all Americans who have died defending our freedoms. God bless their families and loved ones.

Honored to be part of ceremony for law enforcement in Okaloosa Cnty today. They keep FL safe; keep our officers in your prayers #sayfie
I ask all of my friends in jax to get out and vote for Mike Hogan tomorrow. Mike will be a GREAT mayor! #sayfie
Congratulations to crew of Space Shuttle Endeavor now in orbit around the Earth! Thoughts & prayers for them on Endeavor's final mission.
Supporting Special Olympic athletes! http://twitpic.com/4x9v3p
I'm at the torch run for Special Olympics! Looking forward to speaking to these champions.
This AM honoring Pinellas law enforcement who died in line of duty and all slain law enforcement in our state.
My thoughts and prayers go out to the families of victims on 9/11, including my friend who lost husband on 9/11.
Justice was served today by heroic actions of U.S. troops in Pakistan. Thank you to all U.S. servicemen and women.
Memorial event 2day honoring Sarasota teens whose lives were cut short by drug overdose. Great cause, event. http://embracesarasota.com

Just testified on Sen. Fasano's pill mill bill before Sen. Health Reg. cmte; essential that we end epidemic that causes so many to suffer.

Very sad day for FL. Family and friends of Ofc. David Crawford in our prayers. Grateful for his sacrifice.
Touring Homestead Air Reserve Base w/ Sweetwater Mayor Manny Marono & Sweetwater Police Chief Roberto Fulgueira #sayfie

2nd service this week to honor 1st responders making ultimate sacrifice to keep FL safe. We must not forget their sacrifice.
Moving service today for Officers Baitinger and Yaslowitz, slain heroes from St Pete PD. Overwhelming show of support.

My thoughts and prayers are with 1st responders shot this morning in St. Petersburg.
